definition[0]: to get support, interest, attention etc from people by making an effort
example[0]: He travelled throughout Latin America drumming up support for the confederation.
example[1]: The organization is using the event to drum up business (=get more work and sales).
definition[1]: if you drum up business or support, you make an effort to get more of it
example[2]: We have been looking for new ways to drum up business.
